sourcesContent:
<template>
  <va-form
    class="w-[300px]"
    tag="form"
    @submit.prevent="handleSubmit"
  >
    <va-input
      v-model="todo"
      label="Enter Task:"
    />

    <va-input
      v-model="email"
      class="mt-3"
      type="email"
      label="Enter email:"
    />

    <va-select
      v-model="stat"
      class="mt-3"
      label="Select Status:"
      :options="options"
      clearable
    />

    <va-button
      
      class="mt-3"
      @click="addIt"
    >
      Add
    </va-button>
  </va-form>
</template>

  <script>
  import axios from "axios";
  export default {
    name: 'AddTodo',
  data() {
  return {todo:"",stat:"",email:"", options: ["PENDING", "COMPLETED"],
 todos:{'todo':"",'status':"",'email':""}
  };
  },
  methods:{addIt(){
    this.todos['todo']=this.todo
    this.todos['status']=this.stat
    this.todos['email']=this.email
  axios
  .post("http://127.0.0.1:8000/api/v1/todo-list/add/",this.todos)
  .then(setTimeout(alert("added"),1)).catch(err=>{alert("error"),console.log(err.response)})
  }
  }};
  </script>
